mapper.select: with v1 as ( select t1.rn, t1.spu_wid from wp_user_path t1, (select max(rn) rn from wp_user_path where ebp_product_id = #{productId}::int8 and user_id = #{operateUserId}::integer) t2 where ebp_product_id = #{productId}::int8 and user_id = #{operateUserId}::integer and t1.rn = t2.rn ) select active_type, active_dual, trunc(prob * 100, 2) prob, dual_begin, dual_end, v1.rn from wp_purchase_prob t1, v1 where t1.spu_wid = v1.spu_wid and t1.rn = v1.rn and is_spu = '1' order by active_dual asc

select ORDER_DT_WID from WP_USER_PATH t0, (select max(rn) max_rn from WP_USER_PATH where USER_ID = #{operateUserId}::integer and ebp_product_id = #{productId}::int8) t1 where USER_ID = #{operateUserId}::integer and ebp_product_id = #{productId}::int8 and t0.rn = t1.max_rn
select week_day, time_slot from wp_insight_user_timeslot where user_id = #{operateUserId}::integer order by week_day asc

select coupon_id, coupon_deno, coupon_min, coupon_url, epb_product_name, to_char(coupon_valid_end, 'yyyymmdd') coupon_valid_end from wp_insight_user_assist where user_id = #{operateUserId}::integer and epb_product_id = #{productId}::bigint order by priority_no asc
select epb_product_id, epb_product_name, priority_no, price, purch_probability, epb_product_url from wp_insight_user_assist where user_id = #{operateUserId}::integer
select distinct spu_id, spu_name from wp_insight_user_orderseries where user_id = #{userId}::integer order by spu_id desc

select purch_amount, purch_amount_level, purch_price, purch_price_level, purch_times, purch_times_level, purch_interval, purch_interval_level, discount_pct, discount_pct_level, avg_discount, avg_discount_level from wp_user_purch_stats where user_id=#{userId}

select purch_amout, purch_amount_level, purch_amout_pct, purch_amout_pct_level, prod_name, prod_name_pct, expensive_prod_name, expensive_prod_name_pct, discount_pct, discount_pct_level, avg_discount, avg_discount_level from wp_user_purch_spu_stats where user_id=#{userId} and spu_id=#{spuId}
select spu_name from w_product_spu where spu_wid=#{spuId}
select to_char(min(order_dt),'YYYY年MM月DD日') firstBuyDate from wp_insight_user_orderseries where user_id=#{userId}

select case when user_level = 'ULC_01' then '高价值低敏感' when user_level = 'ULC_02' then '高价值较敏感' when user_level = 'ULC_03' then '中价值高敏感' when user_level = 'ULC_04' then '低价值低敏感' when user_level = 'ULC_05' then '低价值高敏感' end user_level from pp_user_spu_value where user_id=#{userId} and spu_wid=#{spuId} limit 1

select case when life_cycle_node = 1 then '新手期' when life_cycle_node = 2 then '成长期' when life_cycle_node = 3 then '成熟期' end lifecycle from pp_user_spu_recmd_new where user_id=#{userId} and spu_wid=#{spuId} and rn_desc = 1 limit 1
